00143         private void CreateNormalMap()
00144         {
00145             try
00146             {
00147                 Bitmap TempImageX = _FilterX.Image;
00148                 Bitmap TempImageY = _FilterY.Image;
00149                 _Image.Dispose();
00150                 _Image = new Bitmap(TempImageX.Width, TempImageX.Height);
00151                 Math.Vector3 TempVector = new Utilities.Math.Vector3(0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
00152                 for (int y = 0; y < TempImageX.Height; ++y)
00153                 {
00154                     for (int x = 0; x < TempImageX.Width; ++x)
00155                     {
00156                         Color TempPixelX = TempImageX.GetPixel(x, y);
00157                         Color TempPixelY = TempImageY.GetPixel(x, y);
00158                         TempVector.X = (double)(TempPixelX.R) / 255.0;
00159                         TempVector.Y = (double)(TempPixelY.R) / 255.0;
00160                         TempVector.Z = 1.0;
00161                         TempVector.Normalize();
00162                         TempVector.X = ((TempVector.X + 1.0) / 2.0) * 255.0;
00163                         TempVector.Y = ((TempVector.Y + 1.0) / 2.0) * 255.0;
00164                         TempVector.Z = ((TempVector.Z + 1.0) / 2.0) * 255.0;
00165                         _Image.SetPixel(x, y, Color.FromArgb((int)TempVector.X, (int)TempVector.Y, (int)TempVector.Z));
00166                     }
00167                 }
00168             }
00169             catch (Exception e) { throw e; }
00170         }
00171

00182                 _FilterY.Invert = InvertY;

00184                 _FilterY.Direction = Direction.TopBottom;
00185             }
00186             catch (Exception e) { throw e; }
00187         }
